Posts.Content: Hello, just looking for a bit of advice please! I found a lump on my breast last week, I was seen by my doctor who referred me to the breast clinic. I received my appointment for next week but a few days later I received confirmation from my doctor and on it it says ‘2ww suspected breast cancer rde’ does a doctor put suspected breast cancer on most referrals as this is what they want to rule out? Or because they feel it’s very likely it is? Also, does anyone know what ‘RDE’ stands for? I can’t find anything on this. It’s probably something simple but I would just like to know.Â  Thanks
Posts.Title: Suspected breast cancer
